gameDetails.name: Scythe: Promo Pack #6 â€“ Encounter Card 37
gameDetails.description:
A promotional card given out during the 2017 The Dice Tower Indiegogo campaign.

This promo introduces a new Encounter Card (#37) that you can use in the game. The card shows a woman in a field in the foreground and a man and mech in the background.

The card offers the following options:

     Urge the pair of long-lost lovers to reunite: Gain 2 popularity.
     Buy a plot of this verdant plain: Pay $2 to gain 2 food and 2 oil.
     Re-enlist the soldier before he gets comfortable: Pay 2 popularity to enlist 1 recruit.
